0.cdata!:
La Republique Democratique Populaire Lao
            - Projet de remise en etat et d'assistance technique
            dans le secteur des telecommunications

abstracts.cdata!:
The project is part of the investment
            program for the posts and telecommunication sector during
            1986-1990. The primary emphasis is on system rehabilitation
            and management improvement. The project comprises: (a)
            rehabilitation and limited expansion of the
            telecommunications network to improve utilization of
            existing capacity and improvement of warehousing, repair and
            maintenance shops, and strengthening of all other general
            support facilities. The project also involves a technical
            assistance component to provide advice in all major
            management areas. These include: (i) investment planning;
            (ii) financial management; (iii) project engineering and
            coordination, (iv) operation amd maintenance; and (v) staff
            training. Sector reorganization is currently being
            implemented by the Government and will be supported by this
            technical assistance component.
